Title: Establishes the small business energy conservation ombudsman program
Summary: Establishes the small business energy conservation ombudsman program to represent small businesses on issues relating to state energy policy and the goals of the climate leadership and community protection act.
LawCode: Add ยง138-a, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing the small business energy conservation ombudsman program
